ext_description.p: A printed_connector_template_terminal_relationship is a type of and a that implements the ARM concept of .

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The printed_connector_template_terminal_relationship shall be related to a with a description of 'printed connector template'.
The printed_connector_template_terminal_relationship shall have a that is a with a description of 'interface terminal'.
The printed_connector_template_terminal_relationship shall have a that is a with a description of 'join terminal'.
The related and relating shape aspects shall not be the same .
The combination of related and relating shape_aspects shall be unique within a population of printed_connector_template_terminal_relationship.

ext_description.p: A printed_part_cross_section_template_terminal is a type of that implements the ARM concept of .

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The printed_part_cross_section_template_terminal shall be related to exactly one with a description of 'printed part cross section template' as the 'cross section definition'.
The printed_part_cross_section_template_terminal shall be in exactly one that has a name of 'area edge segment' or 'curve edge segment'.
The printed_part_cross_section_template_terminal shall be in no more than one with a name of 'material to left of terminal' that specifies a .
The printed_part_cross_section_template_terminal shall be in no more than one with a name of 'material to right of terminal' that specifies a .
The printed_part_cross_section_template_terminal shall be in no more than one with a name of 'material to top of terminal' that specifies a .
The printed_part_cross_section_template_terminal shall be in no more than one with a name of 'material to bottom of terminal' that specifies a .
If the material link to the left of the terminal exists and the material link to the right of the terminal exists, then they shall not be the same material link.
If the material link to the left of the terminal exists and the material link to the top of the terminal exists, then they shall not be the same material link.
If the material link to the left of the terminal exists and the material link to the bottom of the terminal exists, then they shall not be the same material link.
If the material link to the top of the terminal exists and the material link to the right of the terminal exists, then they shall not be the same material link.
If the material link to the bottom of the terminal exists and the material link to the right of the terminal exists, then they shall not be the same material link.
If the material link to the top of the terminal exists and the material link to the bottom of the terminal exists, then they shall not be the same material link.

ext_description.p: A printed_part_template_connected_terminals_definition is a type of that implements the ARM concept of .

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The printed_part_template_connected_terminals_definition shall relate to at least two printed_part_template_terminals with a description of 'interface terminal' or 'join terminal' to specify a 'member connected terminal'.
The name shall be unique.

ext_description.p: A printed_part_template_link is a type of and that implements the ARM concept of

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The printed_part_template_link shall not relate to the same through the related and relating attributes.
The printed_part_template_link shall not be any other subtype of or or .
The printed_part_template_link shall reference only a through the related attribute inherited from .
The printed_part_template_link shall reference only a through the relating attribute inherited from .
The printed_part_template_link name inherited from shall be blank.
The printed_part_template_link description inherited from shall be blank.
The printed_part_template_link shall reference only a with a description of 'printed part template' through the related attribute inherited from .
The printed_part_template_link shall reference only a with a description of 'printed part template' through the relating attribute inherited from .

ext_description.p: A printed_part_template_material is a type of that implements the ARM concept of:

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The printed_part_template_material shall have exactly one that is related to a of a as the 'technology usage'.

The printed_part_template_material shall have exactly one representation that has a name of 'physical characteristics representation' and that has two representation items that have names of 'maximum width', 'minimum width'.
The printed_part_template_material shall not participate in a complex instance.
The printed_part_template_material shall not have more than one top boundary.
The printed_part_template_material shall not have more than one bottom boundary.
The printed_part_template_material shall not have more than one left boundary.
The printed_part_template_material shall not have more than one right boundary.

ext_description.p: A printed_part_template_material_link is a type of and a that implements the ARM concept of

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The related boundary shall not be the relating boundary.
The printed_part_template_material_link shall relate to only a in the .
The printed_part_template_material_link shall relate to only a in the .
The types of printed_part_template_material_link shall be only printed_part_template_material_link, , and .
The name attribute of the supertype shall be an empty string.
The name attribute of the supertype shall be an empty string.
The shape specified by the shall not be the shape specified by the .
The description attribute of the relating boundary shall be 'bottom' or 'right'.
The description attribute of the related boundary shall be 'top' or 'left'.
The , combination shall be unique.

ext_description.p: A printed_part_template_terminal is a type of that implements the ARM concepts of:

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The printed_part_template_terminal shall have a description of 'interface terminal' or 'join terminal'.
The printed_part_template_terminal shall be in exactly one .
The printed_part_template_terminal shall relate to at least one 'connection zone'.
The printed_part_template_terminal shall have at least one property that is represented by a .
The printed_part_template_terminal shall be related to exactly one with a description of 'printed part template' or 'printed connector template' as the 'associated definition'.
The printed_part_template_terminal shall be related to at most one as the 'member connected terminal'.

ext_description.p: A printed_part_template_terminal_connection_zone_category is a type of that specifies either an 'area edge segment', a 'curve edge segment', a 'surface area', or a 'surface point' for a .

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The printed_part_template_terminal_connection_zone_category shall have a name equal to 'area edge segment', 'curve edge segment', 'surface area', or 'surface point'.

ext_description.p: A template_material_cross_section_boundary is a type of that implements the ARM concepts of:

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The template_material_cross_section_boundary shall not participate in a complex instance.
The template_material_cross_section_boundary shall be an aspect of a .
The description shall only be 'top', 'bottom', 'left' or 'right'.

ext_description.p: The printed_connector_template_terminal_relationship_unique_constraint rule constrains the population members, that fill the role of ARM , to have unique combinations of ARM and ARM attributes and to have unique combinations of ARM and ARM attributes.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: Every instance of that references a common through a with a name of 'connector' must have a unique attribute that points to a with a description of 'join terminal'.
Every instance of that references a common through a with a name of 'connector' must have a unique attribute that points to a with a description of 'interface terminal'.

ext_description.p: The printed_part_template_terminal_relationship_constraint rule constrains the related and relating of a when it is used as a printed part template terminal relationship.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: Each that has a name = 'printed part template terminal relationship' shall have a that is a .
Each that has a name = 'printed part template terminal relationship' shall have a that is a .
The functional_usage_view_to_printed_part_template_terminal_assignment_constraint rule constrains the related and relating of a when it is used as a functional terminal allocation.
IF .name = 'functional terminal allocation' THEN SELF. shall be a with a description = 'scalar terminal'.
IF .name = 'functional terminal allocation' THEN SELF. shall be an ( whose description = ('interface terminal') ('join terminal')).

ext_description.p: The functional_usage_view_to_printed_part_template_terminal_assignment_unique_constraint rule constrains population members, that fill the role of ARM , so that the combination of ARM and ARM attributes shall be unique within the population.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: Every instance of with a description of 'functional terminal allocation' must have a unique combination of and attributes where the points to a entity.

ext_description.p: The printed_part_template_terminal_unique_constraint rule constrains the population members, that fill the role of ARM , to have unique names on each .

ext_descriptions.ext_description: Every instance of with a description of 'printed part template terminal' that is referenced by a with a name of 'associated definition' that references a common with a description of 'printed part template' must have a unique name attribute value.
The printed_part_template_access_mechanisms function returns the set of printed_part_template_terminals composed of printed_part_template_links specified by the input.
the specified set of printed_part_template_links.
